modName: Point The Way - Expanded Carriages Fix - No More Impaled Horse
summary: Moves the Falkreath sign post in \'Point The Way\' to avoid an impaled horse when using \'Expanded Carriage Service\'.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a quick fix for those using \'Point The Way\' and \'Expanded Carriage Service\' together.

A signpost outside of Falkreath has been moved slightly to avoid a rather nasty looking impalement of a carriage horse.

This mod requires \'Point The Way\' and must be placed after it in your load order.

Expanded Carriage Service is not actually required, but you wouldn\'t use this mod without it anyway.
author: Thicketford

files.name: Point The Way - Expanded Carriage Service Fix
